author: David Wondrich
description: Rich whiskey and maraschino with subtle pineapple balanced by a dash of brut champagne.
name: The Prince of Wales Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker
Add next five ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
